Package com.example.wizard_project.Adapters

Class BrowseEntrantAdapter

java.lang.Object
android.widget.BaseAdapter
android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Entrant>
com.example.wizard_project.Adapters.BrowseEntrantAdapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.Filterable, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, android.widget.ThemedSpinnerAdapter
public class BrowseEntrantAdapter extends android.widget.ArrayAdapter<Entrant> implements android.widget.Filterable
BrowseEntrantAdapter is a custom ArrayAdapter to display the list of entrants for an event.

  • Field Summary

    IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION
